item.title: #7 - Spotify
item.description: The Question: When was the last time you called your mother? The Topic: Music streaming becomes us all. The Viewermail: Overcoming bitchitis.

item.title: #7 - Spotify
item.description: the_question When was the last time you calld your mother? In my case, I don’t speak to my mother anymore. (cold hard bitch) But if you love your mum, give her a call. Dad too. (In my case, I don’t even know if he’s alive or not) [play fail sound] the_topic Spotify. Talk about music streaming, how it’s become a thing. Talk about the old days of pirating.
